snippet: The European Union will provide “an unprecedented package of European political, economic and security support” to the Israelis and Palestinians if they reach a permanent peace deal, the union said in a statement.
abstract: European Union says it will provide unprecedented package of European political, economic and security support to the Israelis and Palestinians if they reach a permanent peace deal.
lead_paragraph: The European Union will provide “an unprecedented package of European political, economic and security support” to the Israelis and Palestinians if they reach a permanent peace deal, the union said in a statement.

headline.main: E.U. Pledges Aid for Mideast Peace
headline.print_headline: E.U. Pledges Aid for Mideast Peace
